title: A microfluidic biomimetic system from the blood-brain barrier to activated microglia towards anti-Mesial Temporal Lobe Epilepsy drug screening.
abstract: The development of drugs for mesial temporal lobe epilepsy (mTLE) is hampered by the absence of preclinical models that can concurrently evaluate blood-brain barrier (BBB) penetration and target efficacy.
